mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT `id` ,`user_sendid` ,`user_receiveid` ,`content` ,`createdat` FROM `chat` WHERE (`user_sendid` = #{userid} AND `user_receiveid` = #{opponentid}) OR (`user_sendid` = #{opponentid} AND `user_receiveid` = #{userid}) ORDER BY `id` DESC LIMIT #{chatLogSize} ) log ORDER BY id ASC

SELECT `id` ,`user_sendid` ,`user_receiveid` ,`content` ,`createdat` FROM `chat` WHERE `id` < #{chatid} AND ( (`user_sendid` = #{userid} AND `user_receiveid` = #{opponentid}) OR (`user_sendid` = #{opponentid} AND `user_receiveid` = #{userid}) )
ORDER BY `id` DESC LIMIT #{chatLogSize}
